source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts
source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.

items.title: Chinese painting / Sumie course  : painting different orchid
items.headline: orchid painting lesson from Beginner to Advanced with english subtitle
objectives_summary: Learn every technique of painting different orchids

items.title: A beginners guide to lock picking
items.headline: Learn how to pick locks from a certified locksmith.
objectives_summary: Introductory lockpicking and the defeating of locks.

items.title: Caves to Castles: Introducing Ancient to Medieval Art
items.headline: A journey into the aesthetics of the ancient world
objectives_summary: Basic cultural background and art analysis from Ancient through Medieval periods

items.title: Watercolours of boats for beginners and beyond

objectives_summary: The students will learn how to hold a pencil correctly
Understand the means by which shadow and edges are shown
Learn how to draw more freely

items.headline: Learn What All the Available Art Materials Are and Which Art Supplies are the Best.
objectives_summary: Save time and money by Knowing How to Buy the Perfect Art Supplies that You'll Love
Know what the various art supplies are and which are the best.
Know which art supplies go together and which are compatible.

objectives_summary: How to paint like Japanese visual novel game

Useful Photoshop techniques

items.title: Simple Watercolor Techniques for Relaxation & Stress Relief
items.headline: Use watercolor features and learn basic and fun techniques to meditate and relax at home
objectives_summary: Basic watercolor techniques
Principles of watercolor as a medium
4 methods of using watercolor features for relaxation and stress relief

items.title: Carving a Simple Wood Spirit with a Flat Chisel
items.headline: A simple foray into the world of wood carving for complete beginners
objectives_summary: How to make different cuts to reveal a face
A simple step by step system that can be replicated and modified to suit
How to read the grain of the wood and keep the flow with possible mistakes

objectives_summary: How to choose a floral still life composition and color scheme

items.title: Advanced Soap Decorating 1
items.headline: Using cake decorating techniques in soapmaking
objectives_summary: Learn basic tools and decorating techniques
Learn to make soap cupcakes and pies

items.title: Materialligraphy Masterclass

visible_instructors.title: Joy Tay
visible_instructors.job_title: Pen & Ink Experimenter & Hand Letterer | Joynhands Designs
visible_instructors.name: Joy

items.headline: Expand Your Product Offerings By Learning How To Do Calligraphy On Anything From A to Z
objectives_summary: Prepare and prime your materials (any material from agate to zucchini!) so that you can show off your calligraphy skills effectively

Choose the right tools and supplies so that you don’t waste time and money buying the wrong ones which may come highly recommended (for working with paper!) but utterly useless for working with another material you want to work on
Display your calligraphy work and the process so that clients can find you, without needing expensive cameras or software

items.title: Car Design: How to Draw The Interior of a Car
items.headline: Guiding you through the process of sketching a car interior.
objectives_summary: Drawing the interior of a car
The process and techniques
How to quickly lay out the interior

items.title: Creating Colorful Urban Landscapes
items.headline: Learn to create your own urban landscapes using references!
objectives_summary: Work with references
Create personalized reference sheets

items.title: How To Draw The Entire Face

objectives_summary: Students will learn how to draw each part of the face and the entire face with easy, comprehensive, step-by-step instructions.
